00024 #ifndef _PARABOLA_HPP_
00025 #define _PARABOLA_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include <vector>
00029 #include <iosfwd>
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace pwiz {
00033 namespace math {
00034 
00035 
00036 class Parabola
00037 {
00038     public:
00039 
00040     // construct by giving 3 coefficients
00041     Parabola(double a=0, double b=0, double c=0);
00042     Parabola(std::vector<double> a);
00043 
00044     // construct by giving 3 or more sample points
00045     Parabola(const std::vector< std::pair<double,double> >& samples);
00046 
00047     // construct by weighted least squares
00048     Parabola(const std::vector< std::pair<double,double> >& samples,
00049              const std::vector<double>& weights);
00050 
00051     std::vector<double>& coefficients() {return a_;}
00052     const std::vector<double>& coefficients() const {return a_;}
00053 
00054     double operator()(double x) const {return a_[0]*x*x + a_[1]*x + a_[2];}
00055     double center() const {return -a_[1]/(2*a_[0]);}
00056 
00057     private:
00058     std::vector<double> a_;
00059 };
00060 
00061 
00062 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Parabola& p);
00063 
00064 
00065 } // namespace math 
00066 } // namespace pwiz
